description:
Course Updated: August 14 2015

Over 1600 students!

Do you want to learn how to make 6 or 7 figures with CPA marketing?

Some Student Reviews:

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"This is one of the best courses I have ever been through. I believe that if I follow the steps by the T I will see success. Hard work will always pay off. No need to chase any more shiny objects. I love the homework because it keeps you moving forward to accomplish your goal and that is to build a solid business using CPA. I have learned a lot and I thank the Mr. Bashir for putting in the effort to teach and his drive to see his students succeed." -Guandi

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"Very in-depth and comprehensive course. There's something for the beginner and the more advanced. A must have training if you plan to make lots of money in 2015." -Lenny Ramirez

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"I like the fact that this course teaches the wholistic view of CPA Marketing. Everything from the mindset to setting up the business' structure to the marketing. Good stuff" -Travis Townsend

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Students of this course will get massive discounts to all of our courses plus any courses we make in the future.

Are you interested in making money online and want to get started with Affiliate Marketing?Within Affiliate Marketing, CPA Marketing is one of the simplest and quickest ways to make money online. You don't need to have your own product, nor sell anyone else's products. You'll learn the steps to creating a successful and sustainable business around CPA Marketing.

Create profitable CPA campaigns and see your conversions skyrocket!

This course includes the following:

  • 70+ videos/lectures with approx. 4.5 hours of video
  • Homework & Action Modules
  • Handouts
  • Projects
  • Collaborative & Interactive environment
  • 1 on 1 support, ask us anything on CPA marketing under discussions

Continual course updates

The course is broken down into 5 modules:

  1. Orientation and getting started: Learn the basics about starting your own business and other important factors, such as mindset and key things that will enable your success
  2. Introduction to CPA Networks: Learn about Sales, Marketing (choosing niches) as well as getting set up with CPA Networks
  3. Media Buying Strategies: Recognize profitable niches and CPA offers and start setting up campaigns
  4. Mobile CPA Strategies: Learn how to add this powerful arsenal to your CPA Marketing business
  5. Advanced CPA Strategies: Learn and Implement advanced techniques here, such as negotiating deals, incentive offers and building an email list

I created this course to fill a gap in the marketplace. There's not very much solid, actionable training in CPA marketing, so this will help students learn the basics but also give ways to apply them and start seeing results.

Viewing all the videos won't take more than a week or two, however, the homework and actual results will take longer to achieve. This is NOT a race to the finish - this is an endurance contest!

After completing this course, you'll not only be able to choose profitable niches/CPA offers and run CPA campaigns, but you'll also learn these valuable skills, which can help you far beyond CPA Marketing:

  • Basic Website Design & Setup
  • Image Creation & Editing
  • Entrepreneurial Skills

Not only will you have lifetime access to this course, but also access to updates and new techniques/strategies as they unfold. Students will walk away with great knowledge and experience that will help them build a CPA Marketing business, and/or provide consulting services to companies looking to take advantage of CPA marketing to increase their mailing lists and advertising efforts.

We strive to help others succeed in life and in business so if you're serious about making money online in 2015 and beyond then this is the ultimate resource on CPA Marketing!

We are backing you with a 30 day refund period. You have absolutely nothing to lose!
title: CPA Marketing From A to Z: Affiliate Marketing Strategies
